trans-unit.source: Specifies the application elements on which it is valid to apply an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 指定有效套用屬性的應用程式項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute> class uses this enumeration to specify the kind of element on which it is valid to apply an attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute>類別會使用這個列舉型別指定的是有效套用屬性的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.AttributeTargets> enumeration values can be combined with a bitwise OR operation to get the preferred combination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AttributeTargets> 列舉值可以與慣用的組合，將位元 OR 運算結合。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the application of attributes to various targets.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明各種目標應用程式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic and Visual C++ syntax currently do not support the application of attributes to type parameters.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 和 Visual c + + 語法目前不支援屬性的應用程式的型別參數。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to any application element.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至任何應用程式項目。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至組件。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to a class.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至類別。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to a constructor.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至委派。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to an event.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至事件。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to a field.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至欄位。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to a generic parameter.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至泛型參數。

trans-unit.source: Currently, this attribute can be applied only in C#, Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), and emitted code.
trans-unit.target: 目前，此屬性可以套用只能在 C# 中，Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，並發出程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to an interface.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至介面。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to a method.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至方法。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to a module.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至模組。

trans-unit.source: `Module` refers to a portable executable file (.dll or.exe) and not a Visual Basic standard module.
trans-unit.target: `Module` 是指可移植執行檔 (.dll or.exe) 和不是 Visual Basic 標準模組。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至參數。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to a property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 (Attibute) 可以套用至屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to a return value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Attribute can be applied to a structure; that is, a value type.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至結構，也就是實值型別 (Value Type)。
